articles.title: India closes main border crossing with Pakistan after Kashmir attack - BBC
articles.description: Visas held by some Pakistanis are also cancelled after gunmen killed tourists in Indian-administered Kashmir.
articles.content:
India has announced measures targeting Pakistan, a day after 26 people were killed by gunmen in an attack in Indian-administered Kashmir. 
They include the closure of the main border crossing linkin… [+2751 chars]
